domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

text: NEW: A majority of Americans (54%) say the government is doing a poor job handling coronavirus, a new CNN poll finds. While 44% think the worst is over, 52% believe the worst days are still to come. Four in 10 Americans know someone diagnosed with Covid. https://t.co/MYADH5K0Qn
